topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539cf3a163687238f04b0100#post_539cf3a163687238f04b0100

Fair enough, though I can't imagine that the government would look kindly to you opening up a portal to Equestria, then again, they might fund it if they found some benefits. 

But overall, we can safely say Equestria's going to be overwhelmed if we do move in isn't it? 

I mean our sheer population size would pretty much dwarf Equestria's, I mean the entire brony population.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
Oh right and we also have a lot of people who eat meat and stuff, wait do we need to bring our own cattle into Equestria? 

Thinking on a slightly different scale I can't imagine that us moving into Equestria would work in the long term, unless people want to be eating manticores for meat.

"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539cf41463687238350b0100#post_539cf41463687238350b0100
Upon doing a search with the tags "Shining Armor, Abuse", (and with taking off all filters which I do not recommend for anyone in their right mind to ever do ever ever ever) I only found this one image that is not just rape or Shining as the one being abused, and I honestly find it to just be a bit silly really.

*(Warning: Grimdark)* >>297926

Any other image searched with those tags will pretty much just be rape, or too tame for what I feel Random is looking for.  For anything else, I don't think this site would supply it, or at least not at this time.[/spoiler]

topics.body:
!http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jpthu5iudVA/TyoawvosLhI/AAAAAAAAAOQ/7Kh46Ez0Gvk/s1600/kamen-rider-kabuto-42.jpg!
Kamen rider Kabuto is probably the Fastest man in fiction

Riders and Some monsters in the Kabuto setting have an ability called Clock up, Which allows them to move at Light speed for a brief amount of time

Hyper Kabuto has an ability called Hyper Clock up, Which makes things in Clock up look like they're standing still (And He can time travel in that state)

topics.body:
Well I can certainly say that it would be an interesting proposal for time travel. Funny thing is that I'm making a fanfic about time travel and Stargate sort of, having some crew transported to the second world war in a parallel timeline where the Stargate never existed, or the various alien threats. 

And from there they go around screwing things up for the Axis powers. :D

I'd like to see the Battleship Yamato take on a Daedalus class cruiser!
